info.details:
GFX: gabriel_

thx to:

Stonewood - for technical support.
yossi - for his elf-dol_converter.sh script

Control:
Hold the wiimote horicontal like an
NES pad.  [ +  - - oo]

press 2 to restart the game after you died.
press HOME to return to the homebrew channel.
